meta.tagline: Even on your birthday, everyone's entitled to a little trick-or-treat...

rooms.scenario: January 9th, 2020, your 28th birthday. You're all alone in bed and you think you may have heard something at the front door...

choices.message: Get up and investigate the noise
Decide it was probably the wind. Stay in bed

rooms.scenario: You look through the blinds and see that nobody is at the door. On your way back to bed, you hear glass shatter near the back door, followed next by heavy footsteps inside the house...

choices.message: Run to your bedroom and phone for help
Grab a baseball bat from the front closet

rooms.scenario: The noise stops and you fall back asleep. Hours later you hear a loud crash coming from the basement...
You call your boyfriend and scream for help. The call cuts out. You look down and see that your phone is dead. You look down the hallway. Staring back at you is Michael Myers...

choices.message: Open your window and jump out
Make a break for the front door

rooms.scenario: You grab the bat - aluminum. You quickly turn around and see who's in your house. It's Michael Myers...

exit.effectDescription: You take a swing and hit Michael, but it doesn't faze him. He easily muscles the bat away from you and beats your skull in.

rooms.scenario: As you pick up the phone, the power cuts out. You look down and see that you have no service either...

choices.message: Check through the window to see if the street has power
Take a deep breath and investigate the basement

exit.effectDescription: You know this was a bad idea. As you search in the pitch black for clues your eyes adjust to the darkness to find Michael Myers waiting for you. You're dead - why would you choose this?

rooms.scenario: You reach the basement stairs and see a large figure walking up the stairs. You've seen this mask before. Michael Myers...

choices.message: Grab a baseball bat from the front closet
Run back to your bedroom and phone for help

rooms.scenario: You survived the fall, but your ankle is in a lot of pain...

exit.effectDescription: You struggle with the backyard gate that stands in between you and the road. It's jammed. You turn around. Michael plunges his knife into your throat.

rooms.scenario: You panic and struggle with the lock. You manage to get the door open, but before you can escape you are grabbed by the neck and thrown against the wall. Picture frames shatter...

choices.message: Get up and run to the back door

exit.effectDescription: You try to run, but you stumble. Michael catches you and chokes the life out of you.

rooms.scenario: You gasp and shoot out of bed. It was a dream. There is no Michael. There is no baseball bat - you don't even own one...

choices.message: Get up and get a glass of water
Try and get back to sleep

exit.effectDescription: As you drift back to sleep, you hear your closet door open. You open your eyes. Michael's white mask is the last thing you see before you are suffocated with a pillow.

rooms.scenario: The whole street has lost power. It's pitch black outside...

choices.message: Grab a flashlight from the basement

exit.effectDescription: You search the basement blindly for a flashlight. Your hands graze something made of latex. Your eyes adjust. Michael Myers stares at you, turns his head, and plunges his knife right into your stomach.

choices.message: Grab a candle from the washroom

rooms.scenario: You run for what seems like miles. You look up and find a small, rundown treehouse...

choices.message: Climb the tree and enter the treehouse

exit.effectDescription: It's pitch black in the treehouse. You take a few steps. Suddenly, you hear a loud snap and feel a jolt of pain. It's an old bear trap. You bleed to death in darkness.

rooms.scenario: As you look up from the floor, you see who is inside your house. Michael Myers. Michael approaches and tries to slash you a kitchen knife. You dodge the attack and quickly stand up...

choices.message: Pick up a shard of glass and stab Michael

exit.effectDescription: You've made a huge mistake. Michael blocks your attack. He violently grabs you by the back of the head and smashes your face into the shards of glass on the floor.

rooms.scenario: You can't shake this feeling that something is wrong. You have to work tomorrow and it's getting late. You know you should get back to sleep...

exit.effectDescription: You fall asleep watching some movie about a guy in a hockey mask killing people in the woods. You never wake up. Your throat was slit while you slept.

rooms.scenario: You go to the bathroom to get a candle. As you walk back down the hall - softly illuminated by your flame - you see Michael Myers standing in front of you...
You come across the treehouse again. You've been running in circles. You hear the leaves crunch under a dusting of snow in the distance. The sound inches closer. You don't have much time...

choices.message: Climb the tree and enter the treehouse

exit.effectDescription: It's pitch black in the treehouse. You take a few steps. Suddenly, you hear a loud snap and feel a jolt of pain. It's an old bear trap. You bleed to death in darkness.

rooms.scenario: You bolt out the front door. Your neighbour is home, but their lights are off. Towards the main road, you can hear police sirens rapidly approaching...

exit.effectDescription: Your neighbour is slow to get to the door. As the door opens, Michael catches you and bashes your head into the door frame. You die instantly and your neighbour is slaughtered.

rooms.scenario: A few hours later, the banging returns - even louder this time. You hear the back door burst open and the loud thud of heavy footsteps...
You trip, fall and drop the candle. It lights your carpet on fire. You run back to the bathroom and lock the door. The flames are spreading fast as Michael tries to break through the bathroom door...

choices.message: Break your mirror for a weapon

exit.effectDescription: Michael breaks through the door. You slash his neck but that doesn't stop him. He throws you down onto the tile floor and stomps your head repeatedly.

rooms.scenario: You know the layout of your house. You throw the candle at Michael's face and dodge his slash. You run...
It starts to snow heavily and Michael is on your tail. You come out of the forest and reach a dirt road...

exit.effectDescription: The snow falls faster and harder. You see headlights approach as you scream for help and run onto the road waving your arms. The driver can't see you. You are struck by the car and are killed instantly.

rooms.scenario: You see the police and wave them down. An officer gets out and asks for your name. He says your boyfriend called and said you were in danger. His partner, having ventured towards your house while you were talking, is dead in the street - a shovel to the head. Michael is here...
You're alive. You must get out of here immediately...

exit.effectDescription: As you turn the corner of the house, Michael cuts you off. He picks you up and smashes your head against the side of the house.

rooms.scenario: The door is barred from the outside. You can't open it...

exit.effectDescription: Michael catches you before you get to the door and throws you down the stairs. Your neck is broken. It's over.
You struggle with the back door. Michael wastes no time in banging your head into the door until a pool of blood soaks the floor.

rooms.scenario: The door is jammed. It won't open...

exit.effectDescription: The front door won't budge. You scream for help as loud as you can. There's no use. Michael decapitates you.
You have trouble with the back door as you panic. You scream, but it is cut short when Michael twists your neck 180 degrees and breaks your neck.

rooms.scenario: It is now a full blown snow storm. You slip and fall as you run down the road. You look back and to your surprise, see a car plow right into Michael sending him flying towards you. The car loses control and flips over. Michael is knocked out beside you - his knife in reach...

exit.effectDescription: You walk over to Michael. His right arm is broken - bones poking through the skin. He isn't moving. You slit his throat and watch as the life drains from his black eyes.

The drive is alive. You grab her cellphone and phone for help. Police and EMS arrive to take you both to safety. When he was hit, Michael's body was launched back into the forest - it was never found...

rooms.scenario: You watch from the car as Michael takes 6 bullets to the chest. It doesn't stop him. He approaches the officer and tosses his body through the windshield...

exit.effectDescription: You get out of the passenger side door. Michael reaches for you when out of nowhere, the officer, a bloody mess, puts 3 bullets into Michael's head. He calls for backup and EMS. Michael is dead.

rooms.scenario: You hear 6 shots fired. A couple of seconds later you hear the officer scream as Michael crushes his skull...

exit.effectDescription: You trip as you're running. Michael catches up to you. It didn't matter how many of the right choices you made. You're dead.
You final attempt at survival. All you can do is scream. There is no saviour coming, no backup. Michael stares you down. You close your eyes as you feel his blade enter your chest.

rooms.scenario: You push the pedal to the floor. The officer's body obstructs your vision. The car jumps and you hear a loud thud. You've hit Michael...

exit.effectDescription: You reverse at full speed. You feel another jolt, followed by a thud. You get out. Michael's head has been crushed. You survive.

You see Michael, lying motionless in the street. You go over to check on the officer and call for help. The officer tells you to watch out, but it's too late. Michael sneaks up from behind and slits your throat. Your blood sprays the officer in the face. He's next.
